parameter.name: searchDelay
parameter.description: The delay applied when displaying products after selecting a product-category

parameter.name: servicesXMLFile
parameter.description: Xml-file specifying services to group searched users in

parameter.name: printPDFreceiptenabled
parameter.description: Wether to display a button to print a receipt-pdf

parameter.name: patientMedicationDeliveryHistoryDuration
parameter.description: The length of the medication-delivery history for a dossier

parameter.name: defaultLogo
parameter.description: Logo used in search criteria header.

parameter.name: edition
parameter.description: Overal behaviour of the application. Unlocks modules that are specific for certain situations.

parameter.name: numberOfTransToListInSummary
parameter.description: How many performed examinations should be shown in the summary of a dossier

parameter.name: noShowExaminationsGenderM
parameter.description: Semicolon-separated code-matic name of examinations which will not be shown

parameter.name: noShowExaminationsGenderF
parameter.description: Semicolon-separated code-matic name of examinations which will not be shown

parameter.name: MaxSearchFieldsRows
parameter.description: Maximum amount of records shown, when searching in general

parameter.name: MinimumTimeoutInSeconds
parameter.description: Each user can define the time-out of his session; it must be at least x

parameter.name: MFP
parameter.description: [serverid].[objectid]

parameter.name: messageCheckerTimeout
parameter.description: After login an active system message might be displayed; each x seconds the system will check for new messages

parameter.name: imageSource
parameter.description: For many images displayed, the location is cached; if not, the image is searched in this specified location

parameter.name: showLinkNoTranslation
parameter.description: Wether to show a link to add a translation when a translation is missing

parameter.name: showServiceInPatientList
parameter.description: Wether to show the patients' service and bed when searching patients

parameter.name: socialServiceID
parameter.description: [service].[devision]; what service the social-service manager should be searched in

parameter.name: topxadmissiondiagnosisfrequencies
parameter.description: Tells the statistics-generator how large the top of the reported data must be

parameter.name: immoprefix
parameter.description: Prefix for immo-article names

parameter.name: insulineUnit
parameter.description: Unit for insuline-values displayed in examination and its pdf

parameter.name: invalidLabelKeyChars
parameter.description: Some characters are not allowed in labels; no separator

parameter.name: maxcertainty
parameter.description: To make the value of a diagnosis relative against a maximal value

parameter.name: maxgravity
parameter.description: To make a diagnosis' value relative against a maximal value

parameter.name: maximumNumberOfReceipts
parameter.description: When this amount of receipts is registered, reset the receipt-counter

parameter.name: MaximumTimeoutInSeconds
parameter.description: Users can specify a custom time-out for his sessions

parameter.name: maxprestationfamilysize
parameter.description: Length of the family-input field; its maximum length is this value minus 2

parameter.name: maxProductsToShow
parameter.description: Maximum amount of products shown, when searching products

parameter.name: maxRecordsToShow
parameter.description: Maximum amount of products shown, when searching products

parameter.name: getVaccinationQuery
parameter.description: Query to fetch vaccinations from the database (defined in config.xml)

parameter.name: HealthnetServerID
parameter.description: Attached to message-extractor as "source"

parameter.name: HelpFile
parameter.description: Indicates where the helpfile is located; @@language@@ is the language-placeholder

parameter.name: ICPCSubClasses
parameter.description: Display ICPC-subclasses or not

parameter.name: image_extensions
parameter.description: Specifies the kind of images the user can use for bed-locations

parameter.name: iconExtensions
parameter.description: Comma-separated; specifies the kind of images the user can use for his shortcuts

parameter.name: ftpTimeOut
parameter.description: Maximum response time for ftp-server to react

parameter.name: canmodifyexistingcoreadmindata
parameter.description: Wether the user can alter the key-values which specify a dossier : lastname, firstname and date of birth

parameter.name: cardJavaScriptOnLoad
parameter.description: Must be exact this javascript or empty. Wether an opened pdf should print automatically or not.

parameter.name: cardvalidityperiod
parameter.description: The validity of the printed card

parameter.name: defaultMedicationDeliveryType
parameter.description: With (b1) or without (b2) prescription

parameter.name: defaultMaximumBalance
parameter.description: Prestations can be set to have a maximum price

parameter.name: defaultMinimumBalance
parameter.description: Prestations can be set to have a minimum price

parameter.name: enableDatacenterPatientExport
parameter.description: When activated, each dossier can be marked as "to export"

parameter.name: enableExpiredProductsDistribution
parameter.description: Wether to deliver expired medication or no longer take it into account

parameter.name: enableICD10
parameter.description: Searching for ICPC codes will search through ICD10 codes too

parameter.name: documentBase
parameter.description: Directory storing documents linked to assets

parameter.name: echo.gyn.url
parameter.description: Location relative to 'documentsFolder', pointing to a pdf which can be opened from inside the gynaecology-examination

parameter.name: echo.firsttrim.url
parameter.description: Location relative to 'documentsFolder', pointing to a pdf which can be opened from inside the gynaecology-examination

parameter.name: enableProductionWarning
parameter.description: When activated a warning message appears telling the application is a test-system, not a production-system

parameter.name: enableVip
parameter.description: Wether dossiers can be marked as VIP or not

parameter.name: defaultAdmissionManager
parameter.description: Userid; defines the user who is 'defaultAdmissionManager'

parameter.name: defaultAdmissionService
parameter.description: ServiceId; defines the service which is 'defaultAdmissionService'

parameter.name: DefaultFromMailAddress
parameter.description: When the system sends emails, who should be displayed as the sender ?

parameter.name: defaultGender
parameter.description: F=female, M=male; when creating a new dossier, this is the pre-selected gender

parameter.name: excludedLabelTypesNew
parameter.description: Which labels not to synchronise

parameter.name: examinationsXMLFile
parameter.description: Xml-file (in 'templatesource') which specifies the examinations that can be performed per service

parameter.name: equivalentofa
parameter.description: Allows to find prestations independant of accents

parameter.name: equivalentofe
parameter.description: Allows to find prestations independant of accents

parameter.name: defaultLabelCount
parameter.description: How many copies must be printed when printing a patientlabel-pdf

parameter.name: documentationLanguages
parameter.description: For each of the specified languages a "documents/help/openclinic_manual_xx.pdf" should exist

parameter.name: DefaultCountry
parameter.description: When creating a new dossier, this is the pre-selected country

parameter.name: MenuXMLFile
parameter.description: Name of the file which describes the menus (as xml)

parameter.name: TestEdition
parameter.description: When activated, a "stamp" marks the application as "test-edition"

parameter.name: baseDirectory
parameter.description: The directory in which OpenClinic is installed

parameter.name: showUnitID
parameter.description: Show the serviceid or not, whenever a service name is displayed

parameter.name: DocumentsFolder
parameter.description: PATH to directory containing application-pdfs

parameter.name: currency
parameter.description: Any official currenct-code, like dollar = USD, euro = EUR, yen = CNY

parameter.name: currencyDecimals
parameter.description: The accuracy whenever displaying the currency

parameter.name: mxsref
parameter.description: Determines which flag is shown when logging in

parameter.name: securePorts
parameter.description: comma-separated. When loading a pdf in the browser, when SSL is applied on the server, specify the used secure ports

parameter.name: DocumentsURL
parameter.description: URL to directory containing application-pdfs

parameter.name: maxUserDefinedShortcuts
parameter.description: Maximum amount of general shortcuts (icons) a user can define

parameter.name: availableProjects
parameter.description: The application can serve multiple projects (with specific specifications); each user can be permitted acces to all (default) or just certain projects

parameter.name: fillUpSearchServiceScreens
parameter.description: When searching services, specifying no search-criteria will show all services

parameter.name: Debug
parameter.description: When activated, backstage-info is shown in the Tomcat box and the Tomcat log-file

parameter.name: updateVersion
parameter.description: The current application-version, shown at login

parameter.name: userCardType
parameter.description: Specifies the type of usercard being generated as a pdf

parameter.name: Intrusion_BlockPage
parameter.description: When a user attempts to enter the application too many times in vain, he will be redirected to a page telling him his account is blocked

parameter.name: openclinicdbName
parameter.description: The real name of the "occup"-database used; when reffered to in a configged query, the placeholder is '@openclinic@'

parameter.name: objectCacheSize
parameter.description: Often used objects are cached, to increase general system performance; this setting limits the size of the cache

parameter.name: serverId
parameter.description: Each computer serving OpenClinic, must have a unique server-id, in order to make synchronisation towards the main-server possible

parameter.name: templateSource
parameter.description: Location where many configuration- and system-files are stored, URL

parameter.name: PatientLanguages
parameter.description: The list of languages available when registering a dossier; "supportedLanguages" when empty

parameter.name: tempDirectory
parameter.description: Directory where all kinds of temporary files are stored

parameter.name: templateDirectory
parameter.description: Location where many configuration- and system-files are stored, local PATH

parameter.name: documentsdir
parameter.description: Directory storing images indicating the location of a bed

parameter.name: masterEnabled
parameter.description: Wether the actual server is the main-server

parameter.name: DefaultTimeOutInSeconds
parameter.description: After this period of inactivity, the session will time-out and the user shall have to re-login

parameter.name: messageCheckerSnoozeTimeInMinutes
parameter.description: After login an active system message might be displayed; if you choose to let it snooze, it will re-appear every 5 minutes

parameter.name: showAdminInTitleBar
parameter.description: Wether to display some key data of the active dossier in the browsers' title bar

parameter.name: MailProgram
parameter.description: When configured as "spd_send_mail" the 'spdSendMailCommand' will be used to send emails

parameter.name: countersXMLFile
parameter.description: File specifying a counter-name for each table

parameter.name: valueColumn
parameter.description: Some database-servers consider 'value' as a function, others do allow you to name a column that way

parameter.name: charindexFunction
parameter.description: Each sql-server has its own dialect, some functions do the same but have different names

parameter.name: timeStamp
parameter.description: now()/getdate()

parameter.name: concatSign
parameter.description: Each sql-server has its own dialect, some functions do the same but have different names

parameter.name: varcharConvertFunction
parameter.description: varchar --> char; MySQL: concat($value$)

parameter.name: maxbatchsize
parameter.description: The maximum number of selected records (used with top-function)

parameter.name: stdevFunction
parameter.description: standard deviation; each sql-server has its own dialect, some functions do the same but have different names

parameter.name: topFunction
parameter.description: To limit the amount of records fetched by one query, starting at the top. Each sql-server has its own dialect, some functions do the same but have different names

parameter.name: dateColumn
parameter.description: Some database-servers consider 'date' as a function, others do allow you to name a column that way

parameter.name: dateaddFunction
parameter.description: Each sql-server has its own dialect, some functions do the same but have different names

parameter.name: datediffFunction
parameter.description: Each sql-server has its own dialect, some functions do the same but have different names

parameter.name: dateFunction
parameter.description: Each sql-server has its own dialect, some functions do the same but have different names

parameter.name: limitFunction
parameter.description: Each sql-server has its own dialect, some functions do the same but have different names

parameter.name: lengthFunction
parameter.description: Each sql-server has its own dialect, some functions do the same but have different names

parameter.name: lowerCompare
parameter.description: Each sql-server has its own dialect, some functions do the same but have different names

parameter.name: iifFunction
parameter.description: For MySQL: if($condition$,$iftrue$,$iffalse$); to dynamically implement IF-statements in queries

parameter.name: encountertypes
parameter.description: Comma-sparated list of possible types of an encounter

parameter.name: stayclass
parameter.description: prestations of type "hospital stay"

parameter.name: encounterDurationCalculationMethod
parameter.description: When "noLastDay", the hour of the last day is set to 0, so the last day is not counted

parameter.name: fontSizePercentage
parameter.description: Percentage of 7pt font size used for printing clinical documents"

parameter.name: datacenterAdmissionTypes
parameter.description: Type of encounter to search for when exporting medical data (medical.1.1)

parameter.name: datacenterEnabled
parameter.description: When activated the datacenter scheduler will collect data periodically

parameter.name: datacenterFirstActivitySummaryMonth
parameter.description: Value set by system

parameter.name: datacenterFirstGraphYear
parameter.description: The year in which a graph should start

parameter.name: datacenterHostname
parameter.description: URL of datacenter-server, used in html files generated for GIS

parameter.name: datacenterMaxMessagesSent
parameter.description: Maximum amount of messages to email, each time

parameter.name: datacenterPOP3Host
parameter.description: URL for mail-server

parameter.name: datacenterPOP3Password
parameter.description: Password for mail-server

parameter.name: datacenterPOP3Username
parameter.description: Username for mail-server

parameter.name: datacenterScheduleInterval
parameter.description: Every x milliseconds the system checks wether certain data must be exported (according to their specific interval)

parameter.name: datacenterServerId
parameter.description: Indicates which computer is the server for the datacenter

parameter.name: datacenterServerInactiveDaysOrangeAlert
parameter.description: After x days of inactivity the server will be marked orange

parameter.name: datacenterServerInactiveDaysRedAlert
parameter.description: After x days of inactivity the server will be marked red

parameter.name: datacenterSMTPFrom
parameter.description: Source email address for SMTP

parameter.name: datacenterSMTPHost
parameter.description: URL for smtp-mail-server

parameter.name: datacenterSMTPTo
parameter.description: Destination email address for SMTP

parameter.name: datacenterHTTPURL
parameter.description: Datacenter web service URL used to post aggregate data extracts to

parameter.name: datacenterHTTPKey
parameter.description: Security key to be used when posting data to the datacenter web service

parameter.name: datacenterSysAdminMailAddress
parameter.description: Emailaddress to send technical system-messages to

parameter.name: datacenterTemplateSource
parameter.description: The base url for the datacenter project

parameter.name: datacenterUserLogo
parameter.description: The default logo for the datacenter page footer

parameter.name: datacenterVisitTypes
parameter.description: Type of encounter to search for when exporting medical data (medical.1.2)

parameter.name: globalhealthbarometerMonitorInterval
parameter.description: Each x milliseconds the monitor sends statistical data

parameter.name: globalHealthBarometerUID
parameter.description: Unique id given by the system

parameter.name: globalHealthBarometerURL
parameter.description: The configured page registers the sent statistical data

parametergroup.name: Finance
parametergroup.description: Wether to display (1) or not display (0) a checkbox to indicate a variable prestation price

parameter.name: anesthesiaPrestationUid
parameter.description: For some care deliveries (typically surgical procedures), the automatic addition of an 'anesthesia cost' can be configured by specifying a percentage of the original care delivery cost that has to be added for anesthesia. This parameter identifies the 'anesthesia care delivery' that will be added in the OC_DEBETS table (the price being defined as a percentage in the source surgical procedure). This value refers to the UID of the care delivery.

parameter.name: applyLowerProductMargins
parameter.description: Indicates if downward price revisions are allowed when calculating product margins on drugs. 0=not-allowed, 1=allowed.

parameter.name: minimumInvoiceBalance
parameter.description: Invoice balance will be 0 when it has a value between 0 and this specified value

parameter.name: enableProformaPatientInvoice
parameter.description: When activated a button to print a pro-forma invoice shows up

parameter.name: enablePatientInvoiceReceiptCPLR
parameter.description: When activated an other type (CPRL) of invoice is printed

parameter.name: defaultInvoiceModel
parameter.description: ctams, mfp, rama, hmk, ambusa, ...

parameter.name: authorizeCancellationOfOpenInvoices
parameter.description: Wether to display (1) or not display (0) a button to authorise cancellation of open invoices

parameter.name: patientinvoicefootertop
parameter.description: When activated, space is made on pdfs to place a footer

parameter.name: patientInvoiceClosedStatus
parameter.description: Status assigned to a fullfilled invoice (balance = 0)

parameter.name: resetServiceUidForNewDebet
parameter.description: When registering a new debet, should the service be reset ?

parameter.name: resetUserDebetsDate
parameter.description: dd/MM/yyyy; prestations before this date are not considered

parameter.name: reportPriceFormat
parameter.description: [0]=zero when no other value, [#]=nothing unless a value is specified; price format when reporting a hospitals' finances

parameter.name: enableFinancialStatusPrestations
parameter.description: When activated show "deliveries in last 24 hours"

parameter.name: fingerprintBinDirectory
parameter.description: Required for package "com.griaule.grfingerjava.GrFingerJava"

parameter.name: fingerprintIdentificationTreshold
parameter.description: Required for package "com.griaule.grfingerjava.GrFingerJava"

parameter.name: fingerprintVerificationTreshold
parameter.description: Required for package "com.griaule.grfingerjava.GrFingerJava"

parameter.name: referringServer
parameter.description: Fingerprints are read locally, from the central server, the referring server is the remote computer

parameter.name: enableNationalBarcodeID
parameter.description: When activated the barcode-module is accessible

parameter.name: barcodeUpdateURL
parameter.description: The configured page sets the national barcode for the actual patient

parameter.name: imageLabelWidth
parameter.description: Width in pixels of barcodes printed to pdfs

parameter.name: jposFile
parameter.description: Configuration-file for the POS printer

parameter.name: JPOSenabled
parameter.description: Wether to initialise the barcodescanner or not

parameter.name: JavaPOSPrinter
parameter.description: System name of the POS printer (Point Of Service)

parameter.name: javaPOSenabled
parameter.description: When activated a button to print the receipt is shown

parameter.name: defaultWeekschedules
parameter.description: System-set value; xml-based definition of manually composed workschedules

parameter.name: fiscalCountry
parameter.description: When specified, a bonus, other income or deduction can be applied

parameter.name: assets.residualvaluehistory.maxcolcount
parameter.description: The residual value of an asset will be displayed in a table with 4 columns; the remaining years of payoff

parameter.name: administrationSchemaDays
parameter.description: The number of days for which the care plans and drug prescriptions are shown in the nursing module.

parameter.name: activeVaccinations
parameter.description: Asterisk-separated list of id-numbers of immunizations that are being handled by OpenClinic. The id-numbers refer to the id column in the Examinations table in the openclinic database. This parameter can also be managed using the GUI in the 'system>manage>manage active vaccinations' menu

parameter.name: spoolnotifiermessagesfordays
parameter.description: The pace used to report new lab-results

parameter.name: showLabResultsSinceDays
parameter.description: When reading labresults; display the labresults since x days

parameter.name: abnormalModifiers
parameter.description: Lab results that have any of the possible values (asterisk-separated list) in their modifier field will be considered abnormal.

parameter.name: enableAutomaticLabInvoicing
parameter.description: Wether to automatically invoice labresults or not

parameter.name: brokerScheduleInterval
parameter.description: Periodicity used when checking for new lab-results (continuous background process)

parameter.name: maxSelectedLabAnalyses
parameter.description: Maximum amount of analyses in one lab-request

parameter.name: codeChauffeurCat2
parameter.description: If a dossier has this risk, the driverslicense is always due

parameter.name: defaultBrokerLanguage
parameter.description: Any official language code; defines the language to display the lab-results in

parameter.name: labNotifierEmailSender
parameter.description: This address appears as the one who sent the lab-result-notifications

parameter.name: keywordCols
parameter.description: Number of columns to display keywords in

parameter.name: projectlogo
parameter.description: Relative path to logo for the project, in a lab-result pdf

parameter.name: defaultEncounterOrigin
parameter.description: The default origin of an encounter, its location

parameter.name: encounterDiseaseCategoryMandatory
parameter.description: When activated a category is mandatory

parameter.name: quickLabList
parameter.description: user-selected encounter-shortcut; labo-codes, £-separated, default selection of labo-analyses

parameter.name: quickLabListCols
parameter.description: The number of columns in which the labo quicklist must be shown

parameter.name: quickLabListRows
parameter.description: The number of rows in which the labo quicklist must be shown

parameter.name: quickList
parameter.description: prestationids, semicolon separated; default value for user-bound quicklist

parameter.name: quickListCols
parameter.description: The number of columns in which the financial quicklist must be shown

parameter.name: quickListRows
parameter.description: The number of rows in which the financial quicklist must be shown

parameter.name: quickTransaction1
parameter.description: Value set by system; code-matic name of examination; each user can specify some often-used examination-types, as shortcuts

parameter.name: activeMedicationLatency
parameter.description: The number of days drug prescriptions are being considered 'active prescriptions' and therefore are shown on the 'Medical Summary' home page.

parameter.name: centralPharmacyCode
parameter.description: This pharmacy will be the default stock-supplier or -destination

parameter.name: forcepatientforproductstockoperations
parameter.description: 1="Reception from other stock", 2="Reception from a patient", 3="Correction after inventory", 4="Reception from external provider"; Destinationtype will be forced to 'patient'

parameter.name: showProductCategory
parameter.description: Wether to show the products' category (subgroup) when managing products

parameter.name: showProductGroup
parameter.description: Wether to show the products' group when managing products

parameter.name: forceproviderforproductstockoperations
parameter.description: 1="Reception from other stock", 2="Reception from a patient", 3="Correction after inventory", 4="Reception from external provider"; Destinationtype will be forced to 'supplier'

parameter.name: forceservicestockforproductstockoperations
parameter.description: 1="Reception from other stock", 2="Reception from a patient", 3="Correction after inventory", 4="Reception from external provider"; Destinationtype will be forced to 'servicestock'

parameter.name: productstockoperationswithoutdestination
parameter.description: Asterisk-separated; fields describing the destination for the edited stock-operation, will be hidden when the type of the edited operation is part of the configured value

parameter.name: productstockoperationexpireddrugsevacuation
parameter.description: Asterisk-separated; when the type of the edited stock-operation is part of the configured value, the batches of the product are shown

parameter.name: productstockoperationswithoutsource
parameter.description: Asterisk-separated; fields describing the source for the edited stock-operation, will be hidden when the type of the edited operation is part of the configured value

parameter.name: medicationDeliveryToPatientDescription
parameter.description: Serves as "description" of ProductStockOperation; 1="Delivery to patient", 2="Delivery to other stock", 3="Correction after inventory", 4="Elimination of expired drugs"

parameter.name: pharmacyexportmodules
parameter.description: Which sections to list when exporting productstocks for a servicestock

parameter.name: pharmacyexportstock
parameter.description: [serverid].[objectid], header for the servicestock, when exporting productstocks for that servicestock

parameter.name: ShowDeliveriesSinceInDays
parameter.description: When managing product-orders; the max age in days of deliveries to show

parameter.name: pharmacyOrderReceptionDescription
parameter.description: 1="Reception from other stock", 2="Reception from a patient", 3="Correction after inventory", 4="Reception from external provider"; describes the source of the products when editing a product order

parameter.name: defaultProductsMargin
parameter.description: The default margin of a product, when searching products

parameter.name: productStockDefaultImportance
parameter.description: 1=normal, 2=low, 3=high; the default selected importancy of the edited stock

parameter.name: centralPharmacyServiceStockCode
parameter.description: [serverid].[objectid], For hospitalized patients : active users' active services' default service stock, otherwise the configured pharmacy

parameter.name: assumeStock
parameter.description: The product will be considered "in stock", even if it is not in stock

parameter.name: productstockoperationdocumentmandatory
parameter.description: Wether a document should be specified for this stock-operation

parameter.name: enableArchiveDirectoryMonitoring
parameter.description: When activated the main OpenClinic process will monitor for incoming documents that must be archived

parameter.name: enableArchiveDICOMFiles
parameter.description: When activated the archive monitor will try to load each archive document as a DICOM file. If this succeeds, the patient identification information will be extracted from the DICOM document and the file will be archived in the ImageStore PACS module

parameter.name: enableArchiveBarcodePDFFiles
parameter.description: When activated the archive monitor will try to load each archive document as PDF file and search for an archiving barcode in it. If this succeeds, the patient identification information will be recovered from the barcode.

parameter.name: enableArchiveFilenameIdentification
parameter.description: When activated the archive monitor will try to identify the document and the patient based on the document name. This name should match the document number that was generated by OpenClinic when creating the Archive Document transaction.

parameter.name: enableRemoteWeasis
parameter.description: Enables the use of the Weasis DICOM viewer via Java Webstart (deprecated)

parameter.name: enableLocalWeasis
parameter.description: Enables the use of a local Weasis DICOM viewer installed on the user's workstation

parameter.name: enableLocalWeasisViewer3.5
parameter.description: Enables the use of a local Weasis DICOM viewer version 3.5.4 or later, installed on the user's workstation (uses the weasis:// protocol. RECCOMMENDED)

parameter.name: scanDirectoryExcludedExtensions
parameter.description: Files with this extension will be disregarded by the archiving module and will NOT be moved to the error directory. These files will be reprocessed in every archiving run.

parameter.name: scanDirectoryMonitor_notScannableFileExtensions
parameter.description: Files with this extension will be disregarded by the archiving module and will be moved to the error directory

parameter.name: defaultInvoicingCareProvider
parameter.description: [serverid].[objectid]

parameter.name: activeInsuranceServiceUID
parameter.description: The OpenInsurance software keeps the last selected insurance company in memory when coding patient encounters. The value is then used for preventing from having to re-select the same insurance company as long as they code data for the same company.

parameter.name: enableComplementaryInsurance2
parameter.description: When activated a complementory insurance can be specified

parameter.name: defaultInsuranceCreditType
parameter.description: The default type of credit

parameter.name: MFPextendedInformation
parameter.description: When activated extra fields appear when editing insurances

parameter.name: priceFormatInsurar
parameter.description: The format used in pdfs about insurance

parameter.name: defaultExtraInsurar
parameter.description: [serverid].[objectid], the id of the default extra insurar when creating debets

parameter.name: patientSelfInsurarUID
parameter.description: Excludes self-insured patients when set to 'none'

parameter.name: enableSIS
parameter.description: When set to 1, enables the SIS functionalities in OpenClinic
Cuando es igual a 1, habilita las funcionalidades SIS en OpenClinic

parameter.name: SIS
parameter.description: Unique ID number of the SIS insurer (can be found in the insurer editor)
Número de identificación único de la aseguradora SIS (se puede encontrar en el editor de la aseguradora)

parameter.name: sis.username
parameter.description: User name that will be used to connect to the SIS webservices
Nombre de usuario que se utilizará para conectarse a los servicios web de SIS

parameter.name: sis.password
parameter.description: Password that will be used to connect to the SIS webservices
Contraseña que se utilizará para conectarse a los servicios web SIS

parameter.name: sis.senderdni
parameter.description: DNI that will be used for identifying the sender of the information packages to SIS. Usually this should be a staff member of the health facility.
DNI que se utilizará para identificar al remitente de los paquetes de información a SIS. Por lo general, este debería ser un miembro del personal del centro de salud.

parameter.name: fua.disa
parameter.description: Default DISA to be printed on the FUA

parameter.name: fua.ipress.renaes
parameter.description: Default RENAES number to be printed on the FUA

parameter.name: fua.ipress.name
parameter.description: Default hospital name to be printed on the FUA

parameter.name: enableSISProduction
parameter.description: When set to 1, the production environment of SIS will be used. If equal to 0, the development environment of SIS will be used
Cuando es igual a 1, se utilizará el entorno de producción de SIS. Si es igual a 0, se utilizará el entorno de desarrollo de SIS

parameter.name: enableAccreditationValidityPerEncounter
parameter.description: When set to 1, an accreditation number received from SIS remains valid for the total duration of the patient encounter. If set to 0, then the validity of the accreditation number is limited to 24 hours.

Cuando es igual a 1, un número de acreditación recibido de SIS sigue siendo válido durante la duración total del encuentro con el paciente. Si igual a 0, la validez del número de acreditación se limita a 24 horas.

parameter.name: labmiddleware
parameter.description: Middleware software OpenClinic HL7 module is communicating with

parameter.name: enableHL7MessagesAutoPurge
parameter.description: If =1, then automatically remove messages from log tables that match purge criteria (see purgeHL7MessagesOlderThanDays and purgeHL7UnsampledOrdersOlderThanDays)

parameter.name: purgeHL7MessagesOlderThanDays
parameter.description: Removes outgoing and incoming HL7 messages from the log which are older than the number of days specified by this parameter

parameter.name: purgeHL7UnsampledOrdersOlderThanDays
parameter.description: Removes outgoing HL7 messages from the queue for samples that have not been received at the lab within the number of days specified by this parameter

parameter.name: targetHL7hostname
parameter.description: Hostname or ip address of Middleware HL7 receiving server

parameter.name: targetHL7port
parameter.description: ip port Middleware HL7 receiving server is listening on

parameter.name: labanalysercodemapping
parameter.description: identifies the field where OpenClinic can find the analysis codes that must be used for communicating with AMS. "loinc" means that the code in the "Loinc code" field will be used.

parameter.name: labanalysercodemappingmismatchesreplacebylocalcode
parameter.description: If=1, when sending a lab order, OpenClinic will use the local labanalysis code if no “matching code” has been specified for the lab analysis (matching codes are defined by the labanalysercodemapping parameter )

parameter.name: autocreateHL7results
parameter.description: If=1, will automatically insert received analyses in the lab order when these originally had not been requested by the prescriber (e.g. calculated values)

parameter.name: defaultLabTechnicianId
parameter.description: User id (not the alias) to be used for identifying the lab middleware system user

parameter.name: abnormalflagcodemapping
parameter.description: If=ams, will use the AMS logic for abnormal values indication

parameter.name: hl7serverPort
parameter.description: ip port the OpenClinic HL7 receiving server is listening on

parameter.name: worklistsUseShortname
parameter.description: Middleware software OpenClinic HL7 module is communicating with

parameter.name: labbarcodesmask
parameter.description: Barcodes with less significant figures than the length of this mask will be left prefixed with the content of mask (e.g. ig the mask = "0000000000" then barcode "123" becomes "0000000123", if the mask = "9000000000" then barcode "123" becomes "9000000123")

parameter.name: forceExternalLabBarcodes
parameter.description: If=1 then only preprinted barcodes can be used and must be linked to specimen during the sample reception process at the lab

parameter.name: ghb_ref_url
parameter.description: The URL where this OpenClinic instance will be registered for referral/counter-referral operations. The rest of the referral/counter-referral parameters must be managed through the local URL http://localhost/openclinic/main.do?Page=util/manageGHBServer.jsp (menu System>Configuration>Setup>Manage configuration per parameter category)

parameter.name: ghb_ref_updateurl
parameter.description: The URL where this OpenClinic instance will be registered for referral/counter-referral operations. The rest of the referral/counter-referral parameters must be managed through the local URL http://localhost/openclinic/main.do?Page=util/manageGHBServer.jsp (menu System>Configuration>Setup>Manage configuration per parameter category)

parameter.name: ghb_ref_getpubkeyurl
parameter.description: The URL where this OpenClinic instance will be registered for referral/counter-referral operations. The rest of the referral/counter-referral parameters must be managed through the local URL http://localhost/openclinic/main.do?Page=util/manageGHBServer.jsp (menu System>Configuration>Setup>Manage configuration per parameter category)

parameter.name: ghb_ref_storemessageurl
parameter.description: The URL where this OpenClinic instance will be registered for referral/counter-referral operations. The rest of the referral/counter-referral parameters must be managed through the local URL http://localhost/openclinic/main.do?Page=util/manageGHBServer.jsp (menu System>Configuration>Setup>Manage configuration per parameter category)

parameter.name: ghb_ref_countmessagesurl
parameter.description: The URL where this OpenClinic instance will check if any referral/counter-referral messages are waiting to be retrieved.

parameter.name: ghb_ref_readmessagesurl
parameter.description: The URL where this OpenClinic instance will read referral/counter-referral messages from.

parameter.name: ghb_ref_readmessageurl
parameter.description: The URL where this OpenClinic instance will read a referral/counter-referral message from.

parameter.name: ghb_ref_delivermessageurl
parameter.description: The URL where this OpenClinic instance will deliver referral/counter-referral messages to.

parameter.name: ghb_ref_serverid
parameter.description: The ID for this OpenClinic instance in the referral/counter-referral network

parameter.name: enableGHBMatchOnNatreg
parameter.description: Allow to match patients in the referral/counter-referral network based on national registry number.

parameter.name: enableOpenCarenetMaster
parameter.description: Make this server the master referral/counter referral server where the transit of all messages will be managed

parameter.name: enableGHBMatchOnNameAndDateOfBirth
parameter.description: Allow to match patients in the referral/counter-referral network based on last name, first name and date of birthk

parameter.name: ghb_ref_projectdomain
parameter.description: The project domain for this OpenClinic instance in the referral/counter-referral network

parameter.name: ghb_ref_domain
parameter.description: The domain for this OpenClinic instance in the referral/counter-referral network

parameter.name: ghb_ref_name
parameter.description: The name of this OpenClinic instance in the referral/counter-referral network

parameter.name: ghb_ref_contact
parameter.description: The name of the contact person for this OpenClinic instance in the referral/counter-referral network

parameter.name: ghb_ref_telephone
parameter.description: The phone number of the contact person for this OpenClinic instance in the referral/counter-referral network

parameter.name: ghb_ref_email
parameter.description: The e-mail address of the contact person for this OpenClinic instance in the referral/counter-referral network

parameter.name: ghb_ref_pubkey
parameter.description: The public key of this OpenClinic instance in the referral/counter-referral network

parameter.name: isMPIServer
parameter.description: If=1 then the system will behave as the master source for patient (and other health resources) identification data (Master Patient Index server). The system can then be accessed using a web GUI or a HL7 FHIR based API. In order to limit the web GUI to Master Patient Index Functionality, the 'edition' parameter (see chapter 'General') must be set to 'mpi'.

parameter.name: enableMPI
parameter.description: If=1 then the system unlocks OpenClinic functionality for communicating with an HL7 FHIR based Master Patient Index server

parameter.name: mpiServerSendWelcomeMessageToNewPatients
parameter.description: If=1 and isMPIServer=1 then the system will send a welcome message with personal login and password to each newly registered patient in the Master Patient Index. The message is only sent when a valid email was provided for the patient. If an e-mail address is updated for a patient that previously had no e-mail address, the message is also sent.

parameter.name: MPIServerURL
parameter.description: Base URL for accessing the Master Patient Index web server. If this server redirects to https, make sure to use https in this URL.

parameter.name: MPIFhirServerURL
parameter.description: Base URL for accessing the Master Patient Index HL7 FHIR API. If this server redirects to https, make sure to use https in this URL.

parameter.name: MPIServerLogin
parameter.description: HTTP Basic Authentication login to be used for accessing the Master Patient Index HL7 FHIR API on MPIFhirServerURL. The default login will work on the reference MPI server on http://mpi.ocf.world/openclinic/fhir.

parameter.name: MPIServerPassword
parameter.description: HTTP Basic Authentication password to be used for accessing the Master Patient Index HL7 FHIR API on MPIFhirServerURL. The default password will work on the reference MPI server on http://mpi.ocf.world/openclinic/fhir.

parameter.name: hin.server.identifier
parameter.description: Unique identifier for this server within a hospital information network. This identifier will be appended as a prefix (HL7 FHIR Identifier System value) to all local IDs that are sent to the Master Patient Index server.

parameter.name: mpiGeneratedPatientPasswordLength
parameter.description: Length of initial password that is generated for each patient by the Master Patient Index server (requires isMPIServer = 1)

parameter.name: numberOfDaysBeforeDeletingDocumentsFromSpooler
parameter.description: After this number of days, log entries for documents that have already been successfully transmitted or received, are deleted.

parameter.name: MPIPACSServerHost
parameter.description: IP address or host name of receiving DICOM server linked to the MPI

parameter.name: MPIPACSServerPort
parameter.description: IP address or host name of receiving DICOM server linked to the MPI

parameter.name: calendarVersion
parameter.description: Type of calendar module that is offered by OpenClinic

parameter.name: calendarTimeZone
parameter.description: Timezone where the calendar server is used

parameter.name: agendaColors
parameter.description: Background- and foreground colors that can be used for calendar events, separated by semicolons

parameter.name: googleTranslateKey
parameter.description: Google Translate key to use for automatic translation of labels

parameter.name: googleTranslateURL
parameter.description: Google Translate API to be used

parameter.name: enableAutoTranslate
parameter.description: When set to 1, enables automatic translation of labels to a new language

parameter.name: autoTranslateSourceLanguage
parameter.description: When automatically translating unknown labels is activated, this language will be used as the sourcelanguage for generating translations to the targetlanguage

parameter.name: baseTranslationLanguage
parameter.description: Reference language to be used for manually translating labels. If empty, then the active language of the user interface is used
